entry.title: How to create this blog website using GitHub Pages
entry.content:
搭建博客思路

  1. 利用Github Pages作为博客发布站点，存储博客内容并部署为html网页，便于公众访问。
  2. 利用hexo创建并管理博客。博主只需要提供markdown格式的内容文档，利用hexo可以自动形成样式又没的网页内容，并且具有丰富的主题供可以选择。
  3. 选定hexo主题，修改样式，创建博客存储在Github仓库中，并利用Github Pages部署为网页。

创建Github 仓库

1，注册GitHub账号，注意设置username

2，新建仓库，并将仓库命名为指定格式

仓库名字必须为username.github.io，这也是博客主页的访问网址。

3，将仓库部署为GitHub Pages

部署过程只需要一次操作，之后Github会自动从仓库中获取内容，并发布为网页。

安装并使用hexo

安装Node.js

安装hexo

使用hexo创建博客

修改hexo主题

修改主题

创建关于页

开始博客创作

恭喜

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

entry.title: about
entry.content:
Education

  • Ph.D. in Computer Science

    • Institution of Automation, Chinese Academy of Science, Beijing, China 2025(expected)

    • Research Interests: Artificial Intelligence, Reinforcement Learning, NLP

  • Bachelor of Computer Science

    • Beijing Normal University, Beijing, China (09/2015 - 07/2019)

Research Experience

  • Postdoctoral Researcher - Research Lab/Institution, City, Country (Month Year - Present)

    • Conducting research on [Research Area], working with a team of researchers.
    • Publishing research papers in top-tier conferences and journals.
    • Collaborating with industry partners on real-world applications.

  • Doctoral Research Assistant - University/Research Lab, City, Country (Month Year - Month Year)

    • Investigated [Specific Research Topic] as part of Ph.D. research.
    • Developed novel algorithms and methodologies to address research problems.
    • Presented research findings at international conferences and workshops.
